snippet: The officer, James Hasper, shot Raymond Martinez in the left shoulder after Mr. Martinez drove his S.U.V. through a red light and ran over a different officer, the police said.
abstract: New York Police Officer James Hasper, part of city's Summer All Out campaign to put additional officers in high-crime neighborhoods, shoots Raymond Martinez after he drove his car through red light and ran over another officer in the middle of a busy road.
lead_paragraph: The officer, James Hasper, shot Raymond Martinez in the left shoulder after Mr. Martinez drove his S.U.V. through a red light and ran over a different officer, the police said.

headline.main: Brooklyn Officer Shoots Man Who Fled Traffic Stop, Police Say
